item.title: Haribo sweets recalled in Belgium after cannabis found in Dutch gummies
item.description: The same packages of fizzy colas were withdrawn in the Netherlands after sample studies revealed three bags were laced with cannabis.

item.title: Why organ donation after death is struggling to take root across Central Asia

item.title: Mount Etna volcanic eruption: Is it safe to travel to Sicily and are flights cancelled?
item.description: Mount Etna is Europe's tallest and most active volcano.

item.title: Ursula von der Leyen backs 'bone-crushing' US Senate bill to sanction Russia
item.description: The Senate bill envisions 500% tariffs on countries that buy Russian fossil fuels. If applied as intended, it would target several EU countries.
